title: Create Water
description: Creates 2 gallons/level of pure water.

title: Detect Magic
description: Detects spells and magic items within 60’ for 1 minute per level.

title: Detect Poison
description: Detects poison in one creature or object.

title: Mending
description: Makes minor repairs on an object.

title: Read Magic
description: Read scrolls and spellbooks.

title: Resistance
description: Subject gains +1 on saving throws for 1 minute.

title: Entangle
description: Plants entangle everyone in 40’ radius for 1 minute/level.

title: Faerie Fire
description: Outlines subjects with light for 1 minute/level, cancels blur, invisibility, etc.

title: Goodberry
description: 2d4 berries each cure 1 hp (max 8 hp/24 hours).

title: Obscuring Mist
description: Fog surrounds you, provides concealment for 1 minute/level

title: Produce Flame
description: 1d6 damage +1/level, touch or thrown.

title: Speak with Animals
description: You can communicate with animals for 1min/level.

title: Barkskin
description: Grants +2 or higher bonus to AC for for 10min/level.

title: Gust of Wind
description: Blows away or knocks down smaller creatures.

title: Heat Metal
description: Makes metal so hot it damages those who touch it

title: Summon Swarm
description: Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders for concentration plus 2 rounds

title: Tree Shape
description: You look exactly like a tree for 1hour/level.

title: Warp Wood
description: Bends wood within 20’ radius.

title: Call Lightning
description: Calls down 3d6-damage lightning bolts from the sky once per round for 1min/level.

title: Protection from Energy
description: Absorb 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy for 10min/level.

title: Speak with Plants
description: You can talk to normal plants and plant creatures for 1min/level.

title: Spike Growth
description: For 1hr/level, creatures in area take d4 damage per 5’ movement, may be slowed.

title: Stone Shape
description: Sculpts stone into any shape.

title: Water Breathing
description: Subjects can breathe under water for 2 hours/level divided by number of subjects.

title: Air Walk
description: Subject treads on air for 10min/level

title: Anti-Plant Shell
description: Keeps animated plants at bay for 10min/level, 10’ radius.

title: Ice Storm
description: Hail does 5d6 damage in cylinder 40’ across

title: Reincarnate
description: Brings dead subject back in random body.

title: Repel Vermin
description: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10’ away for 10min/level.

title: Spike Stones
description: Creatures in area take 1d8 damage, may be slowed.

title: Awaken
description: Animal or Tree gains human intellect.

title: Baleful Polymorph
description: Transforms subject into harmless animal.

title: Call Lightning Storm
description: As call lightning, but does 5d6 per bolt.

title: Insect Plague
description: Up to 6 Locust Swarms attack creatures for 1min/level.

title: Transmute Rock to Mud
description: Transforms 2 10’ cubes per level.

title: Wall of Fire
description: Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 damage +1/level.

title: Fire Seeds
description: Creates Acorn Grenades (1d6 fire dmg/lvl divided among up to 4 seeds) that explode in a 10’ radius and ignite combustibles.

title: LiveOak
description: Oak becomes treant guardian.

title: Move Earth
description: Digs trenches and builds hills, in an area up to 750’ square and 10’ deep.

title: Stone Tell
description: Talk to natural or worked stone for 1min/lvl.

title: Transport via Plants
description: Move instantly from one plant to another of its type anywhere.

title: Wall of Stone
description: Creates a wall of stone that can be shaped.

title: Changestaff
description: Your staff becomes a treant on command.

title: Control Weather
description: Changes weather in local area.

title: Earthquake
description: Intense tremor shakes 80’ radius, collapsing ceilings, opening fissures, etc.

title: Finger of Death
description: Kills one subject.

title: Fire Storm
description: Does 1d6/lvl fire damage to 2 10’ cubes per level.

title: Wind Walk
description: You and your allies turn vaporous and travel at up to 60mph for 1 hour/level.
